name: Pancake n' Waffles: Batter-Bash
description:
When waffles take over the land, it's up to you and your trusty gauntlet Meowch to save your world. Pancake n' Waffles: Batter-Bash is about a cat sent to save his world from an invasion of living waffles. 

Keyboard and Mouse required.

Controls:

Up and Down arrow keys to move the cutscene images up and down.

Enter key to continue dialogue.

Escape key to restart the current level.

AD to move left and right

W to jump.

S to drop down certain areas.

Aim with the Mouse.

-------------------------------------

If you don't have the Meowch:

Left Click to Claw Attack.

Climb up walls by walking into them.

If you have the Meowch:

Right Click to Charge.

Left Click to Launch after charging 20+%.

Middle Click to Throw after charging 50+%.

Right Click to call back the Meowch after the indicator next to the health bar lights up.

-------------------------------------

Authors: Adam Aviles, Madeline Finkel, Justin Upsornsopakit, Benthan Vu, Stephen Warner

Made for UCSC: CMPM 80K
